text.section:
If an authority considers it necessary, the authority may include any limitation or restriction on the issuance of additional bonds:
In the resolution that provides for the issuance of bonds of the authority; or
In any trust agreement that secures the bonds.

If a resolution or trust agreement places any limitation or restriction on the issuance of additional bonds, the authority shall honor the limitation or restriction when the authority issues additional bonds.
